sentences.en: A Ballerina who is an ornament to the world of dance.
sentences.cn: 芭蕾舞者是为舞蹈世界增光添彩的人.

sentences.en: Against all the odds she achieved her dream of becoming a ballerina.
sentences.cn: 她冲破重重困难,实现了当芭蕾舞演员的梦想.

sentences.en: All the moves of the ballerina were graceful.
sentences.cn: 那位芭蕾舞演员的所有动作都是很美的.

sentences.en: As a ballerina, to embody the duality of the Swan Queen and the black swan can be a fiendishly difficult task.
sentences.cn: 作为一名芭蕾舞女演员，去体现天鹅女王和黑天鹅的两面性可能是一个残忍的困难的任务。

sentences.en: Bartender, I want to buy that ballerina a drink!
sentences.cn: “服务生, 我想给那位芭蕾舞女买一杯酒! ”

sentences.en: Bartender, I'd like to buy the ballerina another drink!
sentences.cn: 服务生, 我愿意为那位芭蕾舞女买一杯酒!
她成了一名演主角的芭蕾舞女演员。
她是一位杰出的芭蕾舞演员.

sentences.en: She moves with the natural grace of a ballerina.
sentences.cn: 她的动作具有芭蕾舞演员自然优雅的丰姿。

sentences.en: She was beyond all doubt the finest ballerina of her day.
sentences.cn: 她无疑是她那个时代最优秀的芭蕾舞演员.

sentences.en: So graceful was the ballerina that she just seemed to glide.
sentences.cn: 那芭蕾舞女演员翩跹起舞,宛如滑翔.

sentences.en: The ballerina bobbed a curtsy ( to the audience ) before leaving the stage.
sentences.cn: 那个芭蕾舞女演员在下台之前 ( 向观众 ) 行屈膝礼.

sentences.en: The ballerina bobbed a curtsy before leaving the stage.
sentences.cn: 那个芭蕾舞女演员在下台之前行屈膝礼.
芭蕾舞女演员这时开始支配舞台演出.

sentences.en: The ballerina remained suspended in a faultless arabesque.
sentences.cn: 这位芭蕾舞女演员一直保持着完美的阿拉贝斯克舞姿不动。

sentences.en: Under the skin a ballerina might have the heart of a boxer.
sentences.cn: 在皮肤之下，一个芭蕾舞演员可能有一颗拳击者的心。

sentences.en: When she was a little girl , she dreamed of becoming a ballerina.
sentences.cn: 她小时候梦想成为芭蕾舞演员.

sentences.en: Women still wear them with boots, and ballerina shoes.
sentences.cn: 女性们依然搭配着芭蕾风格的靴子穿着紧身牛仔裤.

trans.tran_cn: （意大利语）芭蕾舞女演员（尤指演主角的）
trans.tran_en: a woman who dances in ballets
